name: Grandia ReDux
overview: Grandia ReDux is a mod designed to not only re-balance, but also increase the difficulty of Grandia (PSX). Enemies, items, abilities, characters and environmental changes (such as recovery save points) have been made. The goal is to bring out the potential of Grandia's fantastic battle system and put a greater emphasis on the game's leveling system. In addition, Grandia ReDux introduces new items, new abilities and different spells for each party member.
